questions.question: What is the first step in creating a 3D representation of a concept?

answers.a: Start with UV unwrapping and texturing
answers.b: Finalize the narrative and interaction flows

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a step in software selection?

answers.a: Installing and configuring the required software
answers.c: Choosing software based on needs (e.g., Blender, ZBrush)

questions.question: What is the purpose of low-fidelity prototypes during the prototyping phase?

answers.b: To test the concept and gather user feedback
answers.c: To enhance the final render quality
